channel.title: Unsupported Field Workshops :: Splunk Observability Cloud Workshops
channel.description: Splunk IMSplunk delivers real-time monitoring and troubleshooting to help you maximize infrastructure performance with complete visibility. GDI (OTel & UF)Learn how to get data into Splunk Observability Cloud with OpenTelemetry and the Splunk Universal Forwarder. Splunk OnCallMake expensive service outages a thing of the past. Remediate issues faster, reduce on-call burnout and keep your services up and running.

item.title: Splunk IM
item.description: Splunk delivers real-time monitoring and troubleshooting to help you maximize infrastructure performance with complete visibility.

item.title: Splunk APM
item.description: Splunk APM is a NoSampleâ„¢ Full-fidelity application performance monitoring and troubleshooting solution for cloud-native, microservices-based applications.

item.title: Build a Distributed Trace in Lambda and Kinesis
item.description: This workshop will equip you with how a distributed trace is constructed for a small serverless application that runs on AWS Lambda, producing and consuming a message via AWS Kinesis

item.title: Improving MTTR with Custom Tags
item.description: This workshop offers a method for automatically adding annotations to your application.

item.title: Getting Data In (GDI) with OTel and UF
item.description: Learn how to get data into Splunk Observability Cloud with OpenTelemetry and the Splunk Universal Forwarder.

item.title: Splunk RUM
item.description: End-to-end visibility helps you pinpoint customer-impacting issues from web browsers and native mobile apps to your backend services.

item.title: Splunk OnCall
item.description: Make expensive service outages a thing of the past. Remediate issues faster, reduce on-call burnout and keep your services up and running.
